text: Taras Viktorovych Kutovy (; 25 February 1976 â€“ 21 October 2019) was a Ukrainian economist and politician. He was born in Kyiv. He was a member of the Verkhovna Rada from 2012 through 2014. He was Minister of Agrarian Policy and Food from 2016 through 2018. Kutovy was killed in a helicopter crash on 21 October 2019 in Poltava Oblast at the age of 43. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Taras Kutovy
